text:
JoJo Fletcher and Jordan Rodgers celebrated their one-year anniversary on Friday, May 12. The Bachelorette alums, who met and fell in love on the season 12 finale of the popular ABC reality series, posted touching tributes to mark the milestone occasion.

Set to the romantic tune of Brett Eldredge‘s “Drunk on Your Love,” Fletcher, 26, posted a collection of sweet photos highlighting the couple’s love story. “One year with you @jrodgers11. I love this crazy, beautiful, ridiculous life we have together,” she wrote, alongside the compilation, which features snaps of the pair from that fateful first meeting to the present.

One year with you @jrodgers11 ❤️ I love this crazy, beautiful, ridiculous life we have together 😉 A post shared by JoJo Fletcher (@joelle_fletcher) on May 12, 2017 at 1:16pm PDT

Rodgers, 28, followed up with an equally passionate post. The SEC Network analyst shared a shot of the couple seaside after getting engaged. “One year ago today, and even more my best friend every single day,” he captioned the image.

One year ago today, and even more my best friend every single day #1yearanniversary A post shared by Jordan Rodgers (@jrodgers11) on May 12, 2017 at 9:17am PDT

The duo opened up about their relationship backstage at the 2017 iHeart Country Festival in Austin, Texas earlier this month. “It’s been such a fun year,” Fletcher told E! News backstage. “It’s been stress-free and just good and we’re just enjoying that.”

After a whirlwind beginning, the lovebirds are intent on taking thing slow. “This is a good time to just enjoy being together and to enjoy the courtship that comes along with being engaged,” Fletcher said in a separate interview with AOL. “There isn’t any rush. We’re still getting to know each other, but I think about [getting married]. It’s exciting, but it’s not something that you just do because you’re excited.”

The future bride added that she and Rodgers have found a new normal since falling in love on TV. “We’ve found this good balance. We are both so supportive of one another, and I think that’s the best part about our relationship,” she said. “We trust each other, so it’s not like anything would ever worry us. I’m so proud of him and what he’s doing, and he’s proud of me.”
authors: Kelly Is An Online News Writer For The Knot. She Is A Professional Writer Who Studied English At Ohio State University. Kelly Is A Big Fan Of Tlc'S Day Fiance'
title: JoJo Fletcher and Jordan Rodgers Celebrate One-Year Together

meta_data.description: Former Bachelorette JoJo Fletcher and Jordan Rodgers marked one year of engagement on Friday, May 12—see their sweet messages here!
